item.title: Report X-2024051026
item.description:
Report X-2024051026

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-30T18:16:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-11
  • City: GREENSBORO
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: CALL WAS MADE TO THE DMP CAGE ABOUT A LEAKING HAZMAT. DESIGNATED RESPONDER FOUND PACKAGE ON THE FLOOR WITH THE BOTTOM WET. WHEN RESPONDERE OPENED PACKAGE, ONE OF THE GALLON CONTAINERS HAD A LOOSE CAP. FOLLOWING ALL PROPER RESPONDER METHODS. PAKAAGE WAS SECURED AND RETURNED TO THE DMP CAGE TO BE PROCESSED
